stimulusHtml:
Consider the following code segment.

for (int k = 1; k <= 7; k += 2)

{

System.out.print(k);

}

Which of the following code segments will produce the same output as the code segment above?
choicesHtml:
for (int k = 0; k < 7; k += 2)

{

System.out.print(k);

}

for (int k = 0; k <= 8; k += 2)

{

System.out.print(k + 1);

}

for (int k = 1; k < 7; k += 2)

{

System.out.print(k + 1);

}

for (int k = 1; k <= 8; k += 2)

{

System.out.print(k);

}
